analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xa0ed4c4acbf07c03365d6bbe28150a819aff700f.sol:
	Contract BITIFEX has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xa0ed4c4acbf07c03365d6bbe28150a819aff700f.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xa0ed4c4acbf07c03365d6bbe28150a819aff700f.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
